2107490.name: We don't die here Demo
2107490.description:
GAMEPLAY:

-Your HP is your only resource.

-Traditional turn based, combat. (With a twist~. ... Sadly, due to story purposes, this "twist" in the combat will not be present in the demo. It requires more time for the system to make sense.)

-2 (sort of) endings. ("But wait-" I hear you ask. "This is just the start of the story. How are there 2 endings already?" You'll see what I mean when you play it.)
-1 hidden, collectable doll.

STORY:
An entirely unknown threat has descended on your people and diminished your population from 10 billion to nearly nothing in 4 short weeks. This is your extinction event.

You, Empress Asa, refuse to accept this.

But, you're about to be overrun...

Demo release date: August 24, 2022
Full game release date: Some time in 2023

Demo play time: 20 - 25 minutes.

This game shares the same universe as Ara and the Empty Universe and Our way down.
